comments.author: mttza1@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0b12pre) Gecko/20110210 Firefox/4.0b12pre
Build Identifier: 

Bugzilla provides a simple way to upload a commit in the form of a patch, and for developers to review it.

It should be equally simple to link to a git, Bazaar (bzr), or Subversion (SVN) branch/repository and review that repository.

It would be nice if the review system took into account new commits since the review, not sure how that would be accomplished.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: mttza1@gmail.com

Bugzilla provides a simple way to upload a commit in the form of a patch, and for developers to review it.

Reproducible: Always
I would say that this is more or less a duplicate of bug 395744.

comments.author: justdave@bugzilla.org
comments.text: The bug this was resolved as a duplicate of (under the assumption that said bug would fix this) has just been resolved as WONTFIX.  This is, however, still an issue, so I'm reopening it.
